title: Chibokyuu
description:
1-5. Bi Kou Haha (Beautiful Ass Mom)
We'll train my ass together!" and so... with those words, my lewd training days with my son have officially started.

6-10. Hatsujou Miya (Horny Womb)
Yukitos teacher is visiting his mother today. But things don't go as planned. His teacher and mother ends up having sex with each other while Yukito watches. The relationship between those three will never be the same...
